text:
EyeEm - Photography Community - Berlin, DE

Looking for: Graph Theorist / Data Engineer

General info: http://www.eyeem.com/careers

Posted requisition: https://eyeem.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=10

Yes, we might hire an INTERN, and we can help with your VISA.

Basically we're looking for someone who loves graphs, huge amounts of data, and (hopefully) photography.

We're going to be rolling out a graph DB improve our search tool and are hiring to help with this. I work on on the data team as a Scala developer and am looking to find the same, but that's not by any means mandatory.

Have questions or want to talk about the company?

Come say hello. eric at eyeem.com
